dares: Complete a task you've been avoiding for three days.
Double your average record value for any task tomorrow.
Learn a new skill related to one of your tasks for 30 minutes.
Read a chapter from a book outside your favorite genre.
Perform an act of kindness for a stranger.
Disconnect from all social media for 24 hours.
Write down three things you are grateful for, and why.
Go for a 20-minute walk without any music or podcasts.
Organize a cluttered space in your home or workplace.
Reach out and reconnect with an old friend.
